creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black, red, tan; wood fringed collar with embroidered bands of green diamond shapes; green beads hidden under fringe; 7-1/2" red print bands on sleeve edges; 3/4" red, white, blue tape on all open edges; lower back 24" is solid red, green and white embroidered bands; 7" x 5-1/4" embroidered patch on upper black back
title: Coat
